八一五.definition: 15th August (the date of Japan's surrender in 1945)

八仙桌.definition: old-fashioned square table to seat eight people

八哥兒.definition: erhua variant of 八哥[ba1 ge1]

八字.definition: the character 8 or 八; birthdate characters used in fortune-telling

八字命理.definition: divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date

八字形.definition: shape resembling the character 八 or 8; V-shape; splayed; figure of eight

八字眉.definition: sloping eyebrows, formed like character for "eight"

八旗子弟.definition: child of a Manchu bannerman family (nobility); (fig.) privileged brat

八法拳.definition: Ba Fa Quan "Eight Methods" - Martial Art

八珍湯.definition: eight-treasure decoction, tonic formula used in Chinese medicine

八疸身面黃.definition: eight types of jaundice with yellowing of body and face (TCM)

八相成道.definition: the eight stages of the Buddha's life (Buddhism)

八竿子打不著.pinyin: ba1 gan1 zi5 da3 bu4 zhao2

八級工.definition: grade 8 worker (highest on the eight grade wage scale); top-grade worker

八綱.definition: (TCM) the eight principal syndromes (used to differentiate pathological conditions): yin and yang, exterior and interior, cold and heat, hypofunction and hyperfunction

八綱辨證.definition: pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)

八美.definition: Bamay in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan

八老.definition: "the Eight Great Eminent Officials" of the CCP, abbr. for 八大元老[Ba1 Da4 Yuan2 lao3]

八股.definition: an essay in eight parts; stereotyped writing

八風.definition: see 八風穴|八风穴[ba1 feng1 xue2]
